name: .HO File Extension
summary: Learn about .HO files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An HO file is a game asset archive used by various Heavy Iron Studios video games using the Good Engine or Havok engine, including Up and UFC Personal Trainer. It stores game resources, such as 3D models, animations, textures, audio files, and other assets.

content: Heavy Iron Studios, formerly a subsidiary of THQ, developed several games between 2007 and 2012 using the Good Engine or Havok engine engines that also use HO archives to store resources. Examples of games include:
Family Guy: Back to the Multiverse
While most players will never encounter HO archives, modders may extract, modify, and repackage their contents to add custom textures, models, or other modifications within the associated game.

instructions: You can open HO files with various fan-made utilities. For example, the following programs support HO archives:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
